title: [W]Claimant pension and benefits
p1: [W]It may help the tribunal if you can provide this detail. You will not be penalised for not providing it.
tableHeader: [W]Pension and benefits details provided in ET1
anyContributionsLabel: [W]Did the respondent make any contributions to pension?
